players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob, you killed Alice. Are you the mafia?"
You: "I didn't kill Alice. I was with you at the time. Maybe someone else did."
Diana: "Bob, you are the mafia. I was the detective who found you. Please vote for me."
You: "I was with Charlie when Alice died. He could have done it. He seems suspicious. Vote for him."
Charlie: remained silent.
Diana: "Bob, your alibi with Charlie is shaky—Charlie said nothing. I know you’re the mafia. Vote him."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob, you killed Alice. Are you the mafia?"

You: "Bob, you are the mafia. I was the detective who found you. Please vote for me."
Bob: "I was with Charlie when Alice died. He could have done it. He seems suspicious. Vote for him."
